No screenshots or video of it happening. Probably re-create by popping the honeyfruit and just watching the skuttle.

so Zyra, (my s7 main) 
[quote]PLANT STUFF Removed a rule that told Thornspitters and Vine Lashers to always target nearby enemy champions on-spawn instead of the closest enemy unit, even if the ability that spawned them didn’t hit a champio[/quote]

and replaced it with what... ? they just attack nearest by enemy unit (minion/champ) ?

ok played around lastnight, kinda average, i had multiple times where seedlings wouldn't sprout and u would either root in , deadly spines right behind them. move forward drop 2 seeds next to 1 or 2 passives. hit the enemy with deadly spines followed by burst flash,ignite ULT> and what do i see (2 or 3 times lastnight)... seeds still just sitting there and all i did was dry abilities.. please look into this. also some plants just sitting there not attacking anything. if they were out of range when u sprouted a seedling and minions move into range sometimes they dont attack anything. nor champs.

the strucure destruction component of Ziggs W 'satchel charge' is broken. Ive seen in some cases a ziggs destroy a turret solo in short burts with the combination of his w damage and auto proc from his passive. I understand that he is not being picked enough in mid-lane to warrant nerfs (and the subsequent drop in demand from nerf could further impact pick-rate) but surely you could just remove turret damage from w without influencing his overall kit negatively?
cheers rito {{champion:115}}

So, my profanity filter is permanently on in game, even with it checked off in client. My loading screen has a weird window border at the top despite being borderless and reloading. Border now fixed, but ingame I couldn't see any champions and had to reconnect. Come on. 
On the brightside, atleast names in game are fixed.

check it, save, uncheck it, save again
mine did the same but it fixed after i did that

I think i had the same issue you have with the profanity filter being constantly on. I use the new client and no matter what box i checked in the settings the filter was on in game. To fix it, I had to launch the old client and uncheck the filter setting in there.
Bots have been removed?
